original_text: Father and mother are treated with contempt in you; the sojourner suffers extortion in your midst; the fatherless and the widow are wronged in you.
korean_text: 그들이 네 가운데에서 부모를 업신여겼으며 네 가운데에서 나그네를 학대하였으며 네 가운데에서 고아와 과부를 해하였도다

sentences.original_text: Father and mother are treated with contempt in you
sentences.korean_translation: 아버지와 어머니가 너희 가운데서 멸시를 받습니다

sentences.original_text: the sojourner suffers extortion in your midst
the fatherless and the widow are wronged in you
sentences.korean_translation: 아버지 없는 자와 과부가 너희 가운데서 억울을 당합니다
